about.title: It's all about me baby!
about.contents: Well, Hi! My name's Blaze, and I'm a front end web developer. I've been building small projects for the past two years.

Methodology.title: Methodology
Methodology.contents: This is an area where I've been experimenting a fair amount since I first started.

Projects.title: Project 1
Projects.contents: This is a project I did for a client. It's a simple website for a local business.
